title: The Secrets of Express Routing
content: Routing is the heart of any Express application. By mastering req.params and req.body, you can create dynamic paths that make your blog feel like a professional web app. Remember to always use absolute paths for your static assets!

title: Why I Love JavaScript
content: JavaScript allows us to build interactive experiences without constant page reloads. Using fetch() for delete requests is a game changer for user experience. It keeps the user in flow and prevents that annoying white flash on reload.

title: Coffee and Coding
content: Is there anything better than a fresh cup of coffee and a clean console with no errors? Today I finally fixed my Nodemon restart issue by ignoring my JSON data file. My background image is finally staying put!
